title: Window Blind Sample, ca. 1950
medium:
Medium: synthetic yarns, reeds
Technique: plain weave with paired warps
dimensions: Warp x Weft: 27 x 20 cm (10 5/8 x 7 7/8 in.)
creditline: Gift of the Estate of Dorothy (Liebes) Morin
description: Sample in plain weave with paired and other multiple warps in yellows and metallic yarns. Warps include yellow chenille, yellow boucle, and two different yellow smooth yarns, green and white two-ply yarn, white smooth yarn, two flat metallic braids, narrow wrapped metallic gold. Wefts are reeds.
